TEXT.TITLE: LEUCADIA NATIONAL CORP <LUK> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 3.28 dlrs vs 22 cts Shr diluted 2.99 dlrs vs 22 cts Net 46.0 mln vs 3,328,000 Avg shrs 14.0 mln vs 15.2 mln Year Shr 5.41 dlrs vs 1.56 dlrs Shr diluted 4.94 dlrs vs 1.50 dlrs Net 78.2 mln vs 25.9 mln Avg shrs 14.5 mln vs 15.1 mln NOTE: earnings per share reflect the two-for-one split effective January 6, 1987. per share amounts are calculated after preferred stock dividends. Loss continuing operations for the qtr 1986, includes gains of sale of investments in Enron Corp of 14 mln dlrs, and associated companies of 4,189,000, less writedowns of investments in National Intergroup Inc of 11.8 mln and BRAE Corp of 15.6 mln. Reuter
